document.text:
From: 
To: 
Subject: SDNY indictment 
Date: Thu, 02 Jul 2020 13:06:44 +0000 
Attachments: Maxwell_Indictment,_20_Cr._330.pdf; ATT00001.htm; Maxwell_Arrest_Warrant.pdf; 
ATT00002.htm 
Chris, Mark, and Jeff, 
We are writing to let you know that the FBI arrested your client this morning in Bradford, New Hampshire. I have 
attached the indictment and arrest warrant, which we are providing to you as a courtesy while we seek the formal 
unsealing of the indictment at SDNY this morning. We will let you know when a district judge is assigned at SONY. The 
defendant is currently being transported for arrest processing by the FBI, and our current expectation is that she will be 
presented this afternoon in the District of New Hampshire, via remote proceedings. We will update you as we learn more. 
and =Ind I are available for a call later this morning, if that would be useful. Please let us know what time 
would be convenient for you. 
Thanks, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
One Saint Andrew's Plaza 
EFTA00020358
